verses.roman:
śākhā-upaśākhā, tāra nāhika gaṇana
kichu-mātra kahi' kari dig-daraśana

synonyms: śākhā-upaśākhā—branches and subbranches; tāra—of them; nāhika—there is no; gaṇana—counting; kichu-mātra—something about them; kahi'-describing; kari—I am simply giving; dig-daraśana—a glimpse of the direction.
translation: There are multifarious branches and subbranches of Advaita Ācārya. It is very difficult to enumerate them fully. I have simply given a glimpse of the whole trunk and its branches and subbranches.
